channel.title: Ai on thingsithinkithink
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on thingsithinkithink

item.title: Two AI things from Kent Hendricks' annual 'Things I learned' blog
item.description:
Two AI things I learned reading Kent Hendricks’ annual “Things I learned” blog post:

  1. The introduction of ChatGPT led to a 2% decrease in freelance job postings on Upwork.

item.title: Open Models in 2024: Progress and Challenges
item.description: I recently watched a talk from LatentSpace Live (NeurIPS 2024) by Luca Soldaini a research scientist at the AI Institute, on the state of open models in 2024. His reflections on how far we’ve come—and the challenges ahead—offer a good perspective on where (actually-open)AI might be heading.

item.title: Off-the-Radar AI links for the End of the Year
item.description: Everyone has an exhaustive end of the year list. I don’t but there were a couple of things I got value from that I havne’t seen anyone else posting about.
